languages.text: "Хотел бы я знать. Их и обычно-то непросто понять, этих звездознатцев. Вроде как они имели ввиду, что в естественной среде звезды умирают иначе. А тут их как будто прикончили и ограбили. Всю энергию светил высосали из них, как паук высасывает муху. И это зрелище, позволю отметить, напугало люминовидцев до хлюпанья в их металлических подштанниках".

"Who knows with those star sages. Apparently, when a star dies a natural death, it's different. These look like they were murdered and plundered. All of their energy was siphoned, like when a spider sucks the innards out of a fly. And witnessing these husks, if you don't mind me saying, scared the lumenoreaders so much that they wet their metal trousers."
languages.original_text: "Хотел бы я знать. Их и обычно-то непросто понять, этих звездознатцев. Вроде как они имели ввиду, что в естественной среде звезды умирают иначе. А тут их как будто прикончили и ограбили. Всю энергию светил высосали из них, как паук высасывает муху. И это зрелище, позволю отметить, напугало люминовидцев до хлюпанья в их металлических подштанниках".

traits.locale_text: "I wish I had known. Understanding these star experts has always been a tricky task. I suppose they meant that naturally stars die in a different way, but these look like they were murdered and robbed. All of their energy was sucked out like a spider would suck out a fly. And witnessing this, may I say, scared lumenoreaders so much that they wet their full-metal pants."

"I wish I had known. Understanding these star experts has always been a tricky task. I suppose they meant that naturally stars die in a different way, but these look like they were murdered and robbed. All of their energy was sucked out like a spider would suck out a fly. And witnessing this, may I say, scared lumenoreaders so much that they wet their full-metal pants."

"I wish I knew. Understanding these star sages has always been a tricky task. It seems that they meant that a natural star death manifests differently. These look like they were murdered and robbed. All of their energy was siphoned, akin to how a spider would suck out a fly's internals. And witnessing this, may I say, scared the lumenoreaders so much that they wet their full-metal underpants."

All of their energy was siphoned, akin to how a spider would suck out a fly's internals. And witnessing this, may I say, scared the lumenoreaders so much that they wet their full-metal underpants."

"Who knows with those star sages. Apparently, when a star dies a natural death, it's different. These look like they were murdered and plundered. All of their energy was siphoned, like when a spider sucks the innards out of a fly. And witnessing these husks, if you don't mind me saying, scared the lumenoreaders so much that they wet their metal trousers."

languages.text: “谁知道那些神神叨叨的观星者是什么意思呢？显而易见，正常消亡的恒星明显不是这个样子的。这些恒星看起来像是被什么东西杀害，被劫掠一空。它们所有的能量都被吸干了，就像蜘蛛吮吸苍蝇的内脏一样。如果您不介意我这么说的话，那些观星者光是看到眼前这一幕，恐怕就要吓尿裤子了。”
languages.original_text: "Who knows with those star sages. Apparently, when a star dies a natural death, it's different. These look like they were murdered and plundered. All of their energy was siphoned, like when a spider sucks the innards out of a fly. And witnessing these husks, if you don't mind me saying, scared the lumenoreaders so much that they wet their metal trousers."

traits.locale_text: “谁知道那些神神叨叨的观星者是什么意思呢？显而易见，正常消亡的恒星明显不是这个样子的。这些恒星看起来像是被什么东西杀害，被劫掠一空。它们所有的能量都被吸干了，就像蜘蛛吮吸苍蝇的内脏一样。如果您不介意我这么说的话，那些观星者光是看到眼前这一幕，恐怕就要吓尿裤子了。”

languages.text: « Allez comprendre, avec ces sages stellaires. Apparemment, quand une étoile meurt de mort naturelle, c'est différent. Celles-ci semblent avoir été tuées, puis vidées de leur substance. Leur énergie a été siphonnée à la manière d'une araignée qui sucerait les entrailles d'une mouche. Et la seule vue de ces coquilles vides a horrifié les lumenomaîtres au point de souiller leurs pantalons de métal, si vous voulez bien me passer l'expression. »
languages.original_text: "Who knows with those star sages. Apparently, when a star dies a natural death, it's different. These look like they were murdered and plundered. All of their energy was siphoned, like when a spider sucks the innards out of a fly. And witnessing these husks, if you don't mind me saying, scared the lumenoreaders so much that they wet their metal trousers."

traits.locale_text: « Allez comprendre, avec ces sages stellaires. Apparemment, quand une étoile meurt de mort naturelle, c'est différent. Celles-ci semblent avoir été tuées, puis vidées de leur substance. Leur énergie a été siphonnée à la manière d'une araignée qui sucerait les entrailles d'une mouche. Et la seule vue de ces coquilles vides a horrifié les lumenomaîtres au point de souiller leurs pantalons de métal, si vous voulez bien me passer l'expression. »

languages.text: "Wer weiß das bei diesen Sternenweisen schon? Wenn ein Stern einen natürlichen Tod stirbt, ist das offenbar anders. Dass sie so aussehen, als wären sie ermordet und geplündert worden. Ihre gesamte Energie wurde ihnen herausgesagt, wie eine Spinne die Innereien aus einer Fliege saugt. Und diese Hüllen zu sehen, tut mir leid das zu sagen, hat die Lumenoleser derart entsetzt, dass sie sich in ihre Vollmetallhosen gemacht haben."
languages.original_text: "Who knows with those star sages. Apparently, when a star dies a natural death, it's different. These look like they were murdered and plundered. All of their energy was siphoned, like when a spider sucks the innards out of a fly. And witnessing these husks, if you don't mind me saying, scared the lumenoreaders so much that they wet their metal trousers."

traits.locale_text: "Wer weiß das bei diesen Sternenweisen schon? Wenn ein Stern einen natürlichen Tod stirbt, ist das offenbar anders. Dass sie so aussehen, als wären sie ermordet und geplündert worden. Ihre gesamte Energie wurde ihnen herausgesagt, wie eine Spinne die Innereien aus einer Fliege saugt. Und diese Hüllen zu sehen, tut mir leid das zu sagen, hat die Lumenoleser derart entsetzt, dass sie sich in ihre Vollmetallhosen gemacht haben."

languages.text: «A saber, con esos expertos en estrellas de por medio. Por lo visto, cuando una estrella muere de forma natural, es distinto. Estas han sido asesinadas y saqueadas. Su energía ha sido absorbida como cuando una araña extrae los fluidos de una mosca. Y ver estos restos, aunque esté feo que lo diga, ha hecho que los fotometristas se mojen esos pantalones mecánicos que llevan».
languages.original_text: "Who knows with those star sages. Apparently, when a star dies a natural death, it's different. These look like they were murdered and plundered. All of their energy was siphoned, like when a spider sucks the innards out of a fly. And witnessing these husks, if you don't mind me saying, scared the lumenoreaders so much that they wet their metal trousers."

traits.locale_text: «A saber, con esos expertos en estrellas de por medio. Por lo visto, cuando una estrella muere de forma natural, es distinto. Estas han sido asesinadas y saqueadas. Su energía ha sido absorbida como cuando una araña extrae los fluidos de una mosca. Y ver estos restos, aunque esté feo que lo diga, ha hecho que los fotometristas se mojen esos pantalones mecánicos que llevan».

languages.text: 「星の賢者たちのことは誰にもわからない。どうやら、星が自然死する場合は違うようです。殺されて略奪されたように見えるそうです。クモがハエの内臓を吸い取るように、エネルギーをすべて吸い取らるんです。いうならば、これらを目の当たりにしたルメノリーダーたちは、金属製のズボンを濡らすほど怖がっていました」
languages.original_text: "Who knows with those star sages. Apparently, when a star dies a natural death, it's different. These look like they were murdered and plundered. All of their energy was siphoned, like when a spider sucks the innards out of a fly. And witnessing these husks, if you don't mind me saying, scared the lumenoreaders so much that they wet their metal trousers."

traits.locale_text: 「星の賢者たちのことは誰にもわからない。どうやら、星が自然死する場合は違うようです。殺されて略奪されたように見えるそうです。クモがハエの内臓を吸い取るように、エネルギーをすべて吸い取らるんです。いうならば、これらを目の当たりにしたルメノリーダーたちは、金属製のズボンを濡らすほど怖がっていました」

languages.text: "O yıldız âlimlerine akıl erdirilmez. Bir yıldız doğal yollardan öldüğü zaman durum farklı oluyormuş. Ama bunlar öldürülüp yağmalanmış gibi görünüyor. Enerjilerini örümcek misali yalayıp yutmuşlar. Bu devleri görünce lümenölçerler öyle korkmuş ki... Affedersiniz, metal donlarını ıslatmışlar."
languages.original_text: "Who knows with those star sages. Apparently, when a star dies a natural death, it's different. These look like they were murdered and plundered. All of their energy was siphoned, like when a spider sucks the innards out of a fly. And witnessing these husks, if you don't mind me saying, scared the lumenoreaders so much that they wet their metal trousers."
